title: Account suspended - suspended permanently
body:
Hi Team,

I have been on and off League of Legends (last game back in 04/18); just logged into my account again today to see that my account has been suspended?

Not sure why I this is the case as i don't believe i have done anything wrong...

I play a lot of AI games because they are relaxing and helps me get used to the meta again, and i dont talk during games (i disable opponent chat).

Can you please advise why my account has been suspended and whether it can be reverted?

Kind regards,

Antomiie

replies.body:
It seems likely your account has been compromised at some point. If that's the case, and the actions which resulted in suspension of the account were done by an intruder on the account, then usually that punishment can be reversed once the account is secure.

Your first step should be to change your password. From there, assuming you didn't do whatever the reform card says the account was punished for, didn't share the account with someone who did, and are the original owner of the account, your next step should be to submit an account recovery ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

(You will have to be logged *out* of support to do this)

Once the account is secure, Support can take you through the process of recovering it.
